author: jmargaris
msg: If XPAth results to zero results don't bomb out, just log

author: elecharny
msg: Fixed a lot of bad SYNTAX values.
Updated the geader with the new Syntaxes

author: mprudhom
msg: Allow the parameter to an IN(?) expression to be a Collection type, which allows variable-length IN parameters. The spec is a little vague about whether this should be allowed or not, but there's no reason not to support it.
